chart.name: chart.eleves.exterieur.depart.niveau.sexe
chart.title: situation de depart
chart.dataset:
SELECT Count(self.cdMassar) AS amount, CASE self.sexe WHEN 0 THEN 'G' WHEN 1 THEN 'F' ELSE '' END as sexEleve, _classe.niveau.suffix AS niveauName, _etablissement.name AS etablissement
FROM Eleve self LEFT JOIN self.etablissement AS _etablissement LEFT JOIN self.classe AS _classe WHERE self.etablissement = :_etablissement AND self.situationInitiale =0 AND self.archived = false GROUP BY _etablissement.name, _classe.niveau.suffix, self.sexe
